synopsis.text: Lin Qinghan is the female president of a powerful conglomerate group founded by her grandfather. As he nears the end of his life, greedy relatives hatch schemes to frame Qinghan and seize control of the company's assets. They show no concern for the stability of the business or the welfare of Qinghan. Fortunately, Qinghan has a powerful ally - her husband Zhang Xuan. Known as "Satan" among the lords of the Dragon King's Palace, Zhang Xuan possesses formidable abilities. One by one, he thwarts the relatives' despicable plots and protects both Qinghan and her grandfather's legacy. This anime chronicles the power struggle within the conglomerate as Zhang Xuan uses his wits and strength to counter the relatives' underhanded tactics. Will he succeed in preserving the Lin Group? The answer lies in his cunning mind and mastery of the martial arts as he lives up to his "Satan" moniker.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
